attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The plans for this area take no account of the previously expressed views of the residents of the area, the elected authorities in Leighton Buzzard, Beds or Bucks, yet against this the developer – Paul Newman Homes – appears determined to try and use its financial muscle to push through these plans, using Central Government powers against those of the locally elected officials and residents of the area. At best the residents of the area will see increased traffic, increased risk of accidents due to a blindingly naïve approach to road planning, increased pressure on the railways, the destruction of more green field land and the wholesale reduction in the quality of life of all residents.

rejection.details:
Under planning legislation, the granting of planning permission is the responsibility of the elected local authority. 

The Government cannot express a view on an individual planning application, because of the Secretary of State’s appellate role in the planning system.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
